column4: i am not running the bottom panel how do i add more workspaces
one easy way is to add the workspace applet  change the amount of workspaces and then delete it
im running  gnome do when i add that applet it does no appear on the dock
do you mean that you added the workspace switcher applet but it didn't appear on the panel?
dock im running gnome-do docky but yes
you can open gconf-editor, go to the "/apps/metacity/general/num_workspaces" and change the num_workspaces value
